div.p: This resource is an leaf-node observation of a a mammography breast density. It is referenced by an parent Observation section that references other information about this specific abnormality Observation.value[x] is a single codeableConcept, and is bound to one of the following values

ul.li: Fatty - The breasts are almost entirely fatty
Fibroglandular - Scattered areas of fibroglandular density
HeterogeneouslyDense - The breasts are heterogeneously dense, which may obscure detection of small masses
ExtremelyDense - The breasts are extremely dense, which lowers the sensitivity of mammography.
